Summary: Captured UFO on 5 megapixel digital cam by acciden
divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing with my new Sony DSC F707 5 megapixel camera, and trying out afeature that takes 3 shots in 2.8 seconds, where each shot is exposed a littledarker than the previous shot. I was about a block from my home, next to aballfield at an elementary school, and I was aiming the camera at amountainrange in the background. I did not notice anything unusual when I wastaking the pictures. When I returned home 5 minutes later and transferred theimages to my computer, I noticed a strange object on the second frame. When Iexamined the 3rd frame, the object was also present, but it had to travel alarge distance in less than a second to appear on the other side of themountain. I have the original pics on my computer and can upload them to you forexamination.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Port Alberni
There were no other sightings in Port Alberni on or around April 27th 2002
